description: Retrieves a specific SpeechSynthesisTask object based on its TaskID. This object contains information about the given speech synthesis task, including the status of the task, and a link to the S3 bucket containing the output of the task.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The Amazon Polly generated identifier for a speech synthesis task.

nested_items.name: SynthesisTask
nested_items.description: SynthesisTask object that provides information from the requested task, including output format, creation time, task status, and so on.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: Specifies the engine ( standard, neural, long-form or generative) for Amazon Polly to use when processing input text for speech synthesis. Using a voice that is not supported for the engine selected will result in an error.

nested_items.name: TaskId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Polly generated identifier for a speech synthesis task.

nested_items.name: TaskStatus
nested_items.description: Current status of the individual speech synthesis task.

nested_items.name: TaskStatusReason
nested_items.description: Reason for the current status of a specific speech synthesis task, including errors if the task has failed.

nested_items.name: OutputUri
nested_items.description: Pathway for the output speech file.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: Timestamp for the time the synthesis task was started.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicArn
nested_items.description: ARN for the SNS topic optionally used for providing status notification for a speech synthesis task.

nested_items.name: LexiconNames
nested_items.description: List of one or more pronunciation lexicon names you want the service to apply during synthesis. Lexicons are applied only if the language of the lexicon is the same as the language of the voice.

nested_items.name: OutputFormat
nested_items.description: The format in which the returned output will be encoded. For audio stream, this will be mp3, ogg_vorbis, or pcm. For speech marks, this will be json.

nested_items.name: SampleRate
nested_items.description: The audio frequency specified in Hz.

nested_items.name: SpeechMarkTypes
nested_items.description: The type of speech marks returned for the input text.

nested_items.name: TextType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the input text is plain text or SSML. The default value is plain text.

nested_items.name: VoiceId
nested_items.description: Voice ID to use for the synthesis.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: Optional language code for a synthesis task. This is only necessary if using a bilingual voice, such as Aditi, which can be used for either Indian English (en-IN) or Hindi (hi-IN).
